title: Buttons, 18th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Two flat buttons with shanks; b/: circular, plain edge with central boss surrounded by two rings of facetted bosses c/: similar design to -b, scalloped edge and large central boss.

tombstone.epitaph:
Buttons, 18th century.
18th century. Steel. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-379-b,c.
